SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AutorService
Service for managing authors (DTOAutor) and their relations with books via LibroAutorService.
DAOAutor
The DAOAutor class handles CRUD operations for the Autor (Author) entity.
DAOLibro
The DAOLibro class handles CRUD operations for the Libro (Book) entity.
DAOLibroAutor
The DAOLibroAutor class handles CRUD operations for the Libro_Autor (Book_Author) relationship.
DAOPrestamo
The DAOPrestamo class handles CRUD operations for the Prestamo (Loan) entity.
DAOUsuario
The DAOUsuario class handles CRUD operations for the Usuario (User) entity.
DDL
The DDL (Data Definition Language) class handles database connection, checking if the database exists and executing the SQL script to create it if necessary.
DTOAutor
The type DTOAutor class encapsulate the details for the Autor (Author) entity.
DTOLibro
The type DTOLibro class encapsulate the details for the Libro (Book) entity.
DTOLibroAutor
The type DTOLibroAutor class encapsulate the details for the Libro_Autor (Book_Author) relationship.
DTOPrestamo
The type DTOPrestamo class encapsulate the details for the Prestamo (Loan) entity.
DTOUsuario
The type DTOUsuario class encapsulate the details for the usuario (User) entity.
LibroAutorService
Service class for managing the many-to-many relationship between books and authors.
LibroService
Service class for managing books (DTOLibro) and their relations with authors through LibroAutorService.
Main
The type Main
PrestamoService
Service class for managing loans (prestamos).
ServiceException
The type ServiceException handles all errors in data entry, missing objects, and general application errors, providing customized messages to the user interface.
UI
User interface for managing books, authors, users, and loans.
UsuarioService
Service class for managing users (usuarios).
